column4: in terminal type gconf-editor then go to /apps/gnome-screensaver   uncheck idle_activation_enabled
did you try this? in terminal type gconf-editor then go to /apps/gnome-screensaver   uncheck idle_activation_enabled

i'm not certain it is the gnome screenserver, because on a different machine (which already had the idle_activation disabled through the normal gui), it still showed the idle-activation enabled in gconf-editor
